content.line1: ホームページをご覧いただき、ありがとうございます 🥳
content.line2a: I am a classically trained singer, with experience in musical theatre and pop (including JPop)... but my go-to genre is gospel. I direct the Union Praise Team (gospel and contemporary Christian choir) at
content.line3a: I was born into a teachers' family and have been teaching for more than 15 years, and will always be an educator (empowerer!) at heart. I believe that everyone can sing, and that everyone has the right to be able to express themselves freely through song - and I love helping people achieve this through
content.line4: I'm from Japan and have lived here most of my life, but I've also lived in New York City where I performed at 54 Below (Off Broadway), with the Brooklyn Tabernacle Choir (gospel choir with 6 Grammy Awards), and at numerous jazz clubs around the city. Before that, I attended Princeton University, where I received training in French acting and earned a Bachelor's in Comparative Literature.

cta: 芸歴の詳細やボイスサンプルをお求めの場合は、下記フォームからお願いします。
